UAV Team

The UAV Team designs, builds, and flies unmanned aerial vehicles for research, competition, and club missions.

Fixed-Wing UAV

Autonomous aircraft designed for endurance and mapping missions.

Quadcopter Drone

Custom-built drones for flight testing and competition.
